Job Title: Product Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
About us: Connected Dealer Services is a connected car technology company focused on providing automotive dealers with tools and services that help them optimize their business and drive more profits to their bottom line while maintaining an ongoing relationship with their customers. Our products, including CarRx by Elo GPS, offer solutions that manage their inventory effectively, safeguard assets, reduce costs, enhance service retention, and add value at the point of sale. With our innovative technology and in-depth understanding of new car dealership needs, we provide exceptional products and services that connect our dealers and their customers to timely, accurate, and actionable vehicle information that allows them to confidently make decisions.
Job Summary: The Product Manager plays a pivotal role in driving the growth and success of our B2B2C product. They are responsible for managing the entire product development lifecycle, from concept to launch, and beyond. The product manager is supported by a talented team of product designers and developers to bring our shared vision to life. 
Work Location: Our team is now operating in a remote-friendly capacity and is 100% remote. This position can be done in a hybrid capacity, while expected to be in the office one to three days a week. 
Responsibilities:Define and prioritize product features and enhancements based on customer needs, market trends, and business objectives. Work closely with Product Design and Product Development to create intuitive and engaging mobile and web user experiences that our users love and that are feasible to build. Document and communicate product releases, measure the success of your solutions, and constantly improve them. Analyze product performance, track key metrics, and provide data-driven insights to inform future product decisions. Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and our competitive landscape to identify new opportunities. Be resourceful. Own your product. Roll up your sleeves and get results.
Skills required:Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the sense to leverage data to inform decisions. Passion for innovation and a user-centric mindset, with a focus on creating exceptional experiences for our customers. A knack for breaking a complex solution into small, valuable releases that create impact.  Qualifications and Education Requirements:2+ years of experience in product management, preferably in a SaaS and/or an IoT environment with mobile and web solutions. Proven track record of successfully managing products throughout their entire lifecycle.
Physical Requirements:Must be able to sit for extended periods.Repetitive motion is required for computer entry.
A comprehensive Benefits package with employer contributionsMedical benefits with employer contribution Dental and Vision with employer contributionFlexible Spending Plans and Heath Savings Account programs Basic Life and Personal Accident Insurance (Employer Paid)Ten (10) paid holidays, including two (2) floating holidays.
Interested candidates who meet the minimum qualification are invited to submit a resume and a cover letter outlining their relevant experience to careers@connecteddealerservices.com Please include “Product Manager” in the subject line. Or apply by clicking this link: https://app.trinethire.com/companies/30406-connected-dealer-services-l/jobs/91223-product-manager

Experience Level (if available): None
